items.title: It’s officially flu season: How to avoid getting sick on a plane
items.description: How do you avoid coming down with a bug when traveling? We tapped several experts to give their top tips.

items.title: 12 surprising winter vacation ideas for a warm-weather getaway
items.description: If you’re looking for new winter vacation ideas, try these unexpected locales — from Dominica to India — for a warm-weather getaway.

items.title: Swiss CEO on airline's future: Free snacks, new short-haul seats and maybe even an inflight magazine?
items.description: Swiss CEO Jens Fehlinger said the airline is considering a return of free snacks and a printed inflight magazine to retain high-end status.
